description: This file defines and exports functions related to managing the state of 'boards' in a Kanban board application. It includes type definitions for a 'Board' object and functions to create and update boards, with placeholder implementations.

methods.name: createBoard
methods.description: Creates a new board object with default properties and user-provided data, assigning a unique ID based on the current timestamp.

methods.name: updateBoard
methods.description: Updates an existing board with new data, returning the updated board object with a refreshed 'updatedAt' timestamp.
